bike.description: New 2014 Frame Design, 100% Cr-Mo Tubing, Classic Double Downtube, Looptail Rear End, Retro Dropouts, Limited Edition & Individually Numbered

components.description: SE 3-pc Cr-Mo, Closed-End Invisibolt, 180mm, Sealed American BB, 44T Alloy SE Bubble Sprocket
X-Pedo Low-profile Platform w/ Removable Pins
Sealed Bearing 36H High-Flange Alloy Bubble Mohawk Hubs w/ Alex DM-24 Double-wall Rims, 16T Freewheel, Stainless Spokes
Kenda K-Rad 20" x 2.125" F, 20" x 1.75" R
Tektro BX-310 V-Brake, Slick Cable, Skyway Brake Pads
Retro Alloy Top-Load w/ Engraved SE Logo & Lightweight Cutouts, Hidden Top Cap
SE Lightning Blitz Seat w/ Bottle Opener
New Vintage Vinyl Retro Pads, Alloy Valve Caps
